The Six Components

Having walked through the various scenarios, your design team eventually decides that everything that needs to be done can be accomplished using only six software components. These are the Greeter, the Plan Manager, the Recipe Database, the Date, a Meal, and a Recipe Object.

At this point the responsibilities of each of the components is at least informally developed. From this point forward you can assign the different components to individual members of your programming team for development.
